title.rendered: NEWTECONS HAS BEEN HONORED THE VIETNAM BEST PLACES TO WORK AND MOST ATTRACTIVE EMPLOYERS 2022

content.rendered:
[November 9, 2022, HCMC] Newtecons is honored to be named to Anphabe’s Top 100 Vietnam Best Places to Work and Top 50 Vietnamese Most Attractive Employers 2022 lists.

The Vietnam Best Place to Work is an annual prestigious workplace award presented by Anphabe, a Pioneering Consultant on Employer Branding and Happy Working Environment. The program began in 2013 under the sponsor of the Vietnam Chamber of Commerce and Industry (VCCI).

The award is based on a totally independent study that collected honest opinions from 60,000 respondents across the nation and asked them to rank the workplaces they would most like to work at according to a series of criteria. Benefits, career chances, culture and values, the leadership team, the quality of work and life, the reputation of the organization, etc. are all assessed. The calculations and results were inspected by Intage Vietnam, a market research company.

With consistent efforts over the years, Newtecons has been successful in attracting applicants and keeping personnel with practical activities, such as providing a welcoming and convenient workplace and showing an interest in building the successor team. The best welfare and compensation policies in construction industry are what Newtecons concentrates on creating, including competitive pay, superior health insurance, visiting and caring policies for staff members and their families, etc. Focus on executing training activities and establishing the right environment for employees to succeed in their career path while simultaneously identifying the crucial goal of uniting the entire apparatus and increasing the quality of human resources.

Because people are the key to sustainable development, Newtecons places a strong emphasis on employee happiness, develops unique principles, and will continue to enhance welfare policies to become a second home where employees feel safe and commit to grow.

Newtecons was previously recognized by HR Asia Magazine as one of the Best Companies to Work for in Asia in August 2022. For three years in a row, Newtecons has held this distinction.
